#Station Summary

```

##Data quality codes

```

##Map of station locations

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

```

##Monthly Rainfall

Monthly rainfall at each station as boxplots and the mean monthly evaporation as a line.
```{r echo=FALSE}
SILOMonthlyRainfall(SILO,cols=cols)
```

##Homogeneity tests

```{r echo=FALSE}
SILODoubleMass(SILO)
```
